Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Governmental Operations and the Committee on Civil Rights

Items.Title: Oversight - New York City Census 2010 Efforts: Implementation, Results and Final Steps To Be Taken to Complete the Count.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - New York City Census 2010 Efforts: Implementation, Results and Final Steps To Be Taken to Complete the Count.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Governmental Operations and the Committee on Civil Rights

Resolution calling upon the United States Census Bureau to extend its April 15, 2010 deadline for returning Census forms and to keep both its Question Assistance Centers and Be Counted Sites open for an additional 30 days.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Census Bureau to extend its April 15, 2010 deadline for returning Census forms and to keep both its Question Assistance Centers and Be Counted Sites open for an additional 30 days.
